chapter.text: lokona hisabano samaya najika avi gayo, to pana te'o ajana bani modhum pheravi rahya che
temani pase temana palanahara taraphathi je pana navi navi sikhamana ave che tene te'o ramata-gamatamam sambhale che
temana hrdaya taddana bedarakara che ane te atyacari'o'e dhiredhire vato kari ke te tamara jevo ja manavi che, to sum karana che ke tame nari ankhe jadu samajo cho
payagambare kahyum, maro palanahara te dareka vatane, je dharati ane akasamam che khuba sari rite jane che, te khuba ja sambhalanara ane jananara che

etalum ja nahim parantu te'o kahe che ke a kura'ana, alaga-alaga sapanano sangraha che, parantu tene pote ghadi kadhyum che, parantu a to kavi che. Nahim to amari same a ko'i evi nisani lavi batavato jevum ke agalana payagambarone (nisani'o) la'ine mokalavamam avya hatam
te lokothi pahela jetali vasti'one ame nasta kari, sau imanavala na hatam, to sum have a loko imana lavase
tamara pahela pana jetala payagambaro ame mokalya, te sau purusa hatam, jemani tarapha ame vahi avatarita hatam, basa! Tame kitabavalane puchi lo jo tame pote na janata hoya
Ame te lokona eva sarira nahatam banavya ke te khoraka na le ane na to te'o hammesa rahevavala hatam
pachi ame temani sathe karela badha vacanone pura karya, temane ane je lokone ame icchyum mapha kari didha ane hada vatavi janarane nasta kari didha
ni:Sanka ame tamari tarapha kitaba avatarita kari che, jemam tamara mate sikhamana che, sum to pana tame samajata nathi
ane ghani vasti'o ame nasta kari didhi je atyacari hati ane tyara pachi ame biji komane la'i avya
jyare te loko amari yatanathi ceti gaya to tenathi bhagava lagya
bhagadoda na karo ane jyam tamane khusahali apavamam avi hati, tyam ja tame pacha pharo ane potana gharo tarapha ja'o, jethi tamane savala to kari'e
kaheva lagya aphasosa! Amari kharabi! Ni:Sanka ame atyacari hatam
pachi te'o a pramane ja vata karata rahya, tyam sudhi ke ame te lokone mulathi ukhadeli kheti ane holava'i gayeli aga jeva kari didha
ame akasa ane dharati tatha temani vacceni vastu'one ramata ramata nathi banavi
jo ame ama ja ramata-gamatani iccha karata to tene potani pase ja banavi leta, jo ame karava icchata to
parantu ame satyane jutha para pheki da'i'e chi'e, basa! Satya juthanu mathum todi nakhe che ane te ja samaye nasta tha'i jaya che, tame je vato ghado cho te tamara mate nukasananum karana che
akaso ane dharatimam je kami pana che, te allahanum ja che ane je teni pase che, te teni bandagithi na vidroha kare che ane na to thake che
te rata-divasa allahana namanum smarana kare che ane thodika pana alasa nathi karata
sum te loko'e dharati (na sarjana) manthi je lokone pujya banavi rakhya che, te jivita kari sake che
Jo akasa ane dharatimam allaha sivaya ko'i pujya hota to a banne asta-vyasta tha'i jata, basa! Allaha ta'ala-arsano palanahara, te dareka gunothi pavitra che je a musariko kahe che
te potana karyo mate javabadara nathi ane badha ja (teni same) javabadara che

sum te loko'e allaha sivaya bijane pujyo banavi rakhya che, temane kahido ke la'o, potana purava raju karo. A che mari kitaba ane agalana lokona purava, vata evi che ke temana manthi vadhare padata loko satya nathi janata, etala mate modhum pheravi rahya che
tamarathi pahela pana je payagambara ame mokalya teni tarapha a ja vahi avatarita kari ke mara sivaya ko'i saco pujya nathi, basa! Tame sau mari ja bandagi karo
(musarika loko) kahe che ke rahamanane santana che, (khotum che) te pavitra che, parantu te badha tena pratisthita banda'o che
ko'i vatamam allahani avajna nathi karata, parantu tena adesanum sampurna rite palana kare che
te temana agala-pachalana dareka karyone jane che, te ko'ina mate bhalamana nathi karata, sivaya te lokoni jemanathi allaha raji che, te to pote ja allahana darathi bhayabhita che
temana manthi jo ko'i kahi de allaha sivaya hum bandagine layaka chum to ame tene jahannamani yatana apisum, ame atyacari'one avi ja rite yatana api'e chi'e

sum inkara karanara loko'e evum nathi joyum ke akasa ane dharati eka-bija sathe jodayela hatam, pachi ame te bannene alaga karya, ane dareka jivita vastunum sarjana ame pani vade karyum, chatam pana a loko imana nathi lavata
ane ame dharati para parvata banavi didha, jethi te sarjanane halavi na sake ane ame temam pahola marga banavi didha, jethi te margadarsana melavi sake
Akasane suraksita chata ame ja banavyum, parantu loko teni kudaratani nisani'o para dhyana ja nathi dharata
te ja allaha che, jene rata ane divasanum tatha surya ane candranum sarjana karyum, te dareka potana ksetramam phare che
tamarathi pahela ko'i pana manusyane ame hammesanum (jivana) nathi apyum, jo tame mrtyu pamya to sum te'o hammesa mate rahese
dareka sajiva mrtyuno svada cakhase, ame kasoti mate tamara manthi darekane bura'i ane bhala'inum margadarsana api'e chi'e. Ane tame sau amari tarapha ja pacha pheravavamam avaso

a inkara karanara'o tamane jyare pana ju'e che to tamari maskari kare che, kahe che ke sum a ja che je tamara pujyonum kharaba varnana kare che ane te pote ja rahamanani yadana taddana inkara karanara che
manavi utavalum sarjana che, hum tamane mari nisani'o hamana ja batavisa, tame mari same utavala na karo
kahe che ke jo saca cho to janavo ke a vacana kyare purum thase
kadaca ke a inkara karanara'o janata hota ke te samaye na to a inkara karanara'o agane potana modha parathi hatavi sakase ane na potani pitha uparathi ane na temani madada karavamam avase
(ham-ham) vacanano samaya temani pase acanaka avi pahoncase ane temane ascarya cakita kari dese, pachi na to a loko tene tali sakase ane na to temane thodika pana mahetala apavamam avase
ane tamara pahelana payagambaroni masakari karavamam avi hati, basa! Masakari karanarane te vastu'e gheravamam la'i lidhi jeni te'o masakari karata hatam
temane savala karo ke rahamana vagara, divasa-rata tamari suraksa kona kari sake che? Vata evi che ke a loko potana palanaharana smaranathi phari gayela che
Sum amara sivaya temana bija pujyo che je te'one musibatathi bacavi sake, ko'i pana pujya potani madada nathi kari sakato ane na to ko'i amari taraphathi temani madada karase

parantu ame te lokone ane temana purvajone jivana jivava mate samana apyo, tyam sudhi ke temani ummarano samaya pasara tha'i gayo, sum te loko nathi jota ke ame dharatine tena kinara pasethi ochi kari'e chi'e, have sum te loko prabhutvasali che
kahi do ke hum to tamane allahani vahi dvara saceta kari rahyo chum parantu bahera loko vata nathi sambhalata jyare te lokone saceta karavamam ave che
jo te loko para tamara palanahara taraphathi ko'i yatanani jhapata pana avi pahonce to, pokari uthase ke, haya! Amari kharabi, ni:Sanka ame ja papi hatam

kayamatana divase ame barabara tolanara trajava vacce lavine mukisum, pachi ko'ina para, kami pana, atyacara karavamam nahim ave ane jo eka kana barabara pana karma karyum hase, ame tene hajara karisum ane ame hisaba karava mate purata che
a sace ja satya che ke ame musa ane harunane phensalo karanari, prakasita ane daravavala'o mate sikhamana melavava mateni kitaba api che
te loko, je potana palanaharathi vana dekhe dare che ane kayamatana (vicara)thi dhruje che
ane a sikhamana ane barakatavalum kura'ana pana ame ja avatarita karyum, sum to pana tame a kura'anana inkara karanara bano cho
ni:Sanka ame a pahela ibrahimane ani samajana api hati ane ame teni sthiti sari rite janata hatam
jyare ke tene tena pita ane potani komane kahyum ke a murti'o, jemana tame santo bani betha cho, sum che
sau'e javaba apyo, ke ame amara purvajone amani ja bandagi karata joya
Payagambare kahyum, pachi to tame ane tamara purvajo, sau ni:Sanka spasta rite pathabhrasta rahya
kaheva lagya, sum tame amari pase sace ja satya lavya cho? Athava phakta majaka kari rahya cho
payagambare kahyum ke, na! Kharekhara tamara sauno palanahara to te che je akaso ane dharatino malika che. Jene temanum sarjana karyum, hum to a vatano ja saksi ane kahevavalo chum
ane allahana soganda! Hum tamara te pujyo sathe eka yukti karisa jyare temanathi dura jata raheso
basa! Tene te sauna tukade-tukada kari nakhya, ham phakta moti murti na todi, avum etala mate ke te sau teni ja tarapha phare
kaheva lagya ke amara pujyo sathe avum kone karyum? Avum karanara vyakti kharekhara atyacari che
kahyum, ame eka navayuvanane a vise vata karata sambhalyo hato, jene ibrahima kahevamam ave che
sau'e kahyum, to tene sabhamam lokoni najara same lavo, jethi sau jo'i le
kaheva lagya ke, he ibrahima! Sum tem ja amara devi-devata'o sathe avum karyum che
payagambare javaba apyo, are! A krtyato temana mota'e karyum che, tame potana devi-devata'one ja puchi lo, jo a loko bolata hoya
basa! A lokona hrdayomam a vata besi ga'i ane kaheva lagya ke kharekhara atyacari to tame ja cho
pachi potana vicaramam undha tha'i gaya, (ane kaheva lagya ke) a to tame pana jano cho ke a boli nathi sakata
allahana mitra'e te ja samaye kahyum, du:Kha che, sum tame allaha sivaya temani bandagi karo cho je na to tamane phayado pahoncadi sake che ane na to nukasana
aphasosa che, tamara para ane temana para, jemani tame allahane chodine bandagi karo cho, sum tamane atali pana budvi nathi
Kaheva lagya ke ane bali nakho ane potana devi-devata'oni madada karo, jo tame kasum karava ja icchata hova
ame kahi didhum ke, he aga! Tu thandi tha'i ja ane ibrahima a.Sa. Mate salamati vali tha'i ja
te loko'e ibrahima a.Sa. Mate kharaba icchayum, parantu ame te lokone nisphala banavi didha
ane ame ibrahima ane luta a.Sa.Ne bacavi te dharati tarapha la'i gaya, jemam ame dareka loko mate barakata muki hati
ane ame temane is'haka apyo ane tyara pachi yakuba ane darekane ame sadacari banavya

ane ame temane agevana banavi didha ke amara adesothi lokone margadarsana ape ane ame temani tarapha satkarya karava ane namajhoni pabandi karava ane jhakata apavani vahi kari. Ane te badha ja amari bandagi karanara banda'o hatam
ame luta a.Sa.Ne pana adesa ane jnana apyum ane temane te vasti manthi chutakaro apyo, jyanna loko kharaba krtya karata hatam ane te loko taddana papi hatam
ane ame luta a.Sa.Ne potani krpamam dakhala kari lidha, ni:Sanka te sadacari loko manthi hato
nuha na te samayane yada karo, jyare temane e pahela du'a kari, ame temani du'a kabula kari ane temane tatha temana gharavala'one moti musibatathi chutakaro apyo
ane je loko amari ayatone juthalavi rahya hatam, temani virud'dha ame teni madada kari, ni:Sanka te kharaba loko hatam, basa! Ame te saune dubadi didha

ane da'uda ane sulaimana a.Sa.Ne yada karo, jyare ke te loko eka khetara babate nirnaya kari rahya hatam, thodanka lokoni bakari'o ratre khetaramam caro cari ga'i ane temana nirnaya vakhate ame hajara hatam

Ame temano saco nirnaya sulaimanane samajavi didho, ham! Darekane ame adesa ane jnana api rakhyum hatum ane da'udana vasamam parvato ane pankhi'one pana kari didha hatam, je tasbiha (allahana namanum smarana) karata hatam, ame ja karavavala hatam
ane ame tene tamara mate posaka banavavani karigari sikhavadi jethi yudva vakhate tamara mate bacavanum karana bane, sum tame abhari banaso
ame bhayankara havane sulaimana a.Sa.Na vasamam kari didhi, je temana adesa pramane te dharati tarapha phunkati hati, jyam ame barakata api rakhi hati ane ame dareka vastune khuba sari jani'e chi'e

avi ja rite ghana setanone pana ame temana vasamam karya hatam, je'o temana adesa pramane dariyamam dubaki marata hatam ane te uparanta pana ghana karyo karata hatam, temani dekharekha rakhanara ame ja hatam
ayyuba a.Sa.Ni te sthitine pana yada karo, jyare temane potana palanaharane pokarya ke, mane a bimari pahonci che ane tum daya karavavala'o karata vadhare dayalu che

to ame temani (du'a) sambhali lidhi ane je du:Kha temane pahoncyum hatum tene dura kari didhum ane temane patni ane santana apya, parantu temani sathe temana jeva ja bija pana, potani khasa krpa vade apya, jethi saca banda'o mate sikhamananum karana bane
ane isma'ila ane idarisa ane jhul kiphla (a.Sa.) A sau dhiraja rakhanara banda'o hatam
ame temane potani krpamam dakhala kari lidha, a sau sadacari loko hatam

machalivala (yunusa a.Sa.) Ne yada karo, jyare te'o gus'samam nikali gaya ane vicara karyo ke, ame temani pakada nahim kari saki'e, chevate te andhakaramam pokari uthaya ke, allaha! Tara sivaya ko'i pujya nathi, tum pavitra che. Ni:Sanka hum atyacari loko manthi tha'i gayo
To ame temani pokara sambhali lidhi ane temane du:Khathi chutakaro apyo ane ame imanavala'one avi ja rite bacavi la'i'e chi'e
ane jhakariya a.Sa.Ne yada karo, jyare temane potana palanaharane du'a kari ke he mara palanahara! Mane ekalo na choda, tum sauthi srestha varasadara che

ame temani du'a kabula kari, yahya a.Sa. Apya ane temani patnine temana mate svastha kari didhi, a prabhutvasali loko satkarya tarapha utavala karata hatam ane amane asa ane dara, banne sathe pokarata hatam ane amari same ajiji karavavala hatam
ane te pavitra stri, jene potani abaruni suraksa kari, ame temanamam potani ruha phunki tatha temane ane temana dikarane dareka loko mate nisani banavi didha
a tamari koma che, je kharekhara eka ja koma che ane hum tamara sauno palanahara chum, basa! Tame mari ja bandagi karo
parantu loko'e andaro'andara potana dharmamam matabheda kari didha, sau amari tarapha ja pacha pharavana che
pachi je pana satkarya karase ane te imanavalo hase to tena prayatnoni avaganana karavamam nahim ave. Ame to tene lakhavavala che
ane je vastine ame nasta kari didhi, temana mate sakya nathi ke te pacha phari sake
tyam sudhi ke yajuja ane majujane chodi devamam avase ane te'o dareka unca sthano parathi dodata avase
ane sacum vacana najika avi jase, te samaye inkara karanara'oni najaro phateli rahi jase, ke aphasosa! Ame a paristhitithi ajana hatam, parantu kharekhara ame ja aparadhi hatam
tame ane jeni tame allaha sivaya bandagi karo cho, sau jahannamana indhana banaso, tame sau jahannamamam javana cho
jo a (saca) pujya hota to, jahannamamam dakhala na thata ane dareke dareka temam ja hammesa rahenara che
Te'o tyam ciso padata hase ane tyam kami pana sambhali nahim sake
ham, jena mate amara taraphathi satkarya karavano nirnaya pahela ja tha'i cukyo che, te'o badha jahannamathi dura rakhavamam avase
te to jahannamani ahata pana nahim sambhale ane te'o potani manapasanda vastu'omam hammesa rahevavala che
ko'i moti beceni (pana) te'one nirasa nahim kari sake ane pharista'o temane hatho hatha lese. Ke a ja tamara mate te divasa che jenum vacana tamane apavamam avatum hatum

je divase ame akasane evi lapeti la'isum, jevi rite lekhaka panane lapeti de che, jevi rite ke ame prathama vakhata sarjana karyum hatum, tevi ja rite biji vakhata karisum. A amara sire vacana che ane ame tene jarura purum karisum
ame jhaburamam sikhamana apya pachi a lakhi cukya che ke dharatina varasadara mara sadacari banda'o (ja) hase
bandagi karanara'o mate to amam eka moto adesa che
ane ame tamane srstina loko mate dayalu banavine ja mokalya che
kahi do ke, mari pase to basa! Vahi karavamam ave che ke tamara sauno pujya eka ja che, to sum tame pana teni ajnapalana karavavala cho
pachi jo a loko modhum pheravi le to kahi do ke mem tamane barabara saceta kari didha, jenum vacana tamane apavamam avyum che tenum jnana mari pase nathi ke te najika che athava dura che
ham, allaha ta'ala spasta ane jahera vatone pana jane che ane je kami tame chupavo cho tene pana jane che
mane a viseni pana jana nathi, a tamari kasoti ho'i sake ane eka nakki karela samaya sudhino phayado che
payagambare kahyum, he palanahara! N'yayathi phensalo kara ane amaro palanahara ghano ja dayalu che, jeni pase madada mangavamam ave che, te vato ange jena vise tame varnana karo cho
